com.jayomail.template

Class HTMLTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jayomail.template.Template
      • com.jayomail.template.HTMLTemplate

  • public class HTMLTemplate
extends Template
    HTMLTemplate class represents a template for generating HTML content. It provides methods to set the template content, replace placeholder values, load content from a URL or a file, and build the final HTML content.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.jayomail.template.Template

        content

    • Constructor Summary

      Default constructor.

      Builds the final HTML content after replacing all placeholder values.

      Retrieves the content of the HTML template.

      Loads HTML content from a file and sets it as the template content.
      HTMLTemplate loadFromUrl(String url)
      Loads HTML content from a URL and sets it as the template content.
      HTMLTemplate setTemplate(String content)
      Sets the content of the HTML template.
      HTMLTemplate setValue(String key, String value)
